name: Hectic Toy
description:
You are a Toy collector. And a toy battler. It is time to put your skill to test and collect all 10 Hectic Toys and be the best toy collector the world has ever seen.

Game inspired by Pokemon for the game, PRODUCER (2021) for the style.

Credits/Resources used:

Ash K's Chunkiest Juice Template (https://ash-k.itch.io/chunkyjuice)

Scribbles! font by Andrew-David (https://andrewdavidj.itch.io/scribbles)

MRMOTEXT for the overworld sprites (https://mrmotarius.itch.io/mrmotext)

Lots of photos over Pexels and Wikimedia Commons

Blowdy Life and WelkomenToZooClean by Malre Deszik (http://beta.ccmixter.org/people/MalreDeszik)

Some sound effects over Freesound
